name: purchase_plan
help:
purchase_plan
options:
--name: customer's full name, per government issued ID
--email: customer's email
--user_id: last 4 digits + letter of the customer's NRIC e.g. 123A
--plan_id: ID of plan to purchase
success_message: Plan activated successfully, a confirmation email will be sent to your email. Note that your account number is: A312090312
